; nel seguito viene riportata una semplice sequenza di comandi che dovrebbe

; servire a verificare il comportamento del modulo ENV nel dominio descritto 

; nel file precedente



(exec (action forward) (step 0))



(exec (action forward) (step 1))
(exec (action inform) (param1 3) (param2 4) (param3 discover) (step 2))
(exec (action inform) (param1 4) (param2 4) (param3 checked)(step 3))

(exec (action load_debris) (step  4) (param1 4) (param2 4))

(exec (action unload_debris) (step  5) (param1 3) (param2 5))
(exec (action turnleft) (step 6))

(exec (action forward) (step 7))

(exec (action drill) (step 8) (param1 3) (param2 4))


(exec (action inform) (param1 3) (param2 4) (param3 discover) (step 9))
(exec (action inform) (param1 4) (param2 4) (param3 clear) (step 10))
(exec (action inform) (param1 3) (param2 5) (param3 clear) (step 11))
(exec (action inform) (param1 4) (param2 8) (param3 checked) (step 12))
(exec (action inform) (param1 5) (param2 6) (param3 clear) (step 13))


; Una seconda sequenza di azioni potenzialmante fate da un agente pi√π smart



;(exec (action forward) (step 0))

;(exec (action inform) (param1 3) (param2 4) (param3 discover) (step 1))

;(exec (action forward) (step 2))
;(exec (action inform) (param1 4) (param2 4) (param3 checked)(step 3))

;(exec (action load_debris) (step  4) (param1 4) (param2 4))
;(exec (action turnleft) (step 5))
;(exec (action forward) (step 6)) 



;( exec (action forward) (step 7))
;( exec (action unload_debris) (step  8) (param1 3) (param2 3))
;( exec (action turnright) (step 9))

;( exec (action forward) (step 10))
;( exec (action forward) (step 11))

;( exec (action inform) (param1 6) (param2 2) (param3 checked) (step 12))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 7) (param2 3) (param3 checked) (step 13))

;( exec (action load_debris) (step  14) (param1 6) (param2 2))
;( exec (action turnleft) (step 15))
;( exec (action forward) (step 16))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 7) (param2 2) (param3 checked) (step 17))
;( exec (action unload_debris) (step  18) (param1 6) (param2 1))


;( exec (action turnleft) (step 19))
;( exec (action turnleft) (step 20))
;( exec (action forward) (step 21)) 
;( exec (action turnright) (step 22))

;( exec (action forward) (step 23))
;( exec (action forward) (step 24))
;( exec (action turnleft) (step 25))
;( exec (action forward) (step 26))
;( exec (action forward) (step 27))
;( exec (action forward) (step 28))
;( exec (action turnleft) (step 29))
;( exec (action forward) (step 30))
;( exec (action forward) (step 31))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 6) (param2 7) (param3 discover) (step 32))
;( exec (action forward) (step 33))
;( exec (action turnright) (step 34))
;( exec (action forward) (step 35))
;( exec (action drill) (step 36) (param1 7) (param2 8))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 7) (param2 8) (param3 discover) (step 37))



;( exec (action turnleft) (step 38))
;( exec (action forward) (step 39))
;( exec (action turnright) (step 40))
;( exec (action forward) (step 41))
;( exec (action drill) (step 42) (param1 8) (param2 9))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 8) (param2 9) (param3 discover) (step 43))

;( exec (action turnleft) (step 44))
;( exec (action load_debris) (step  45) (param1 9) (param2 8))
;( exec (action forward) (step 46))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 9) (param2 9) (param3 checked) (step 47))
;( exec (action unload_debris) (step  48) (param1 10) (param2 8))
;( exec (action turnleft) (step 49))
;( exec (action forward) (step 50))

;( exec (action done) (step 51))



;( exec (action inform) (param1 3) (param2 4) (param3 discover) (step 9))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 4) (param2 4) (param3 clear) (step 10))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 3) (param2 5) (param3 clear) (step 11))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 4) (param2 8) (param3 checked) (step 12))
;( exec (action inform) (param1 5) (param2 6) (param3 clear) (step 13))
